The laboratory control group consist HIV-1 seropositive patient hemophilia A stable , triple-combination antiretroviral regimen . Patients treatment group receive indinavir sulfate plus two follow NRTIs : zidovudine ( ZDV ) , didanosine ( ddI ) , zalcitabine ( ddC ) , stavudine ( d4T ) , lamivudine ( 3TC ) . Patients treatment group preferably naive one NRTIs . Patients laboratory control group continue stable triple antiretroviral regimen consist protease inhibitor plus two NRTIs . Patients control group provide antiretroviral medication part study . Patients control group evaluate physical examination , safety laboratory test , CD4 cell count , viral load Day -1 Week 12 . All patient receive usual factor concentrate infusion 10-minute period Day -1 Week 12 estimate factor VIII ( IX ) recovery half-life . Blood sample take prior infusion 30 minute 1 , 3 , 6 , 9 , 12 , 24 hour infusion . All patient require keep daily log document bleed episode use factor VIII ( IX ) throughout study .
